Description: Body sherd of Egyptian black ware pottery open vessel; dull brown Nile silt fabric with mica inclusions; black slip on exterior and interior; inscription on surface.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 629)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.096)
